title: art ent app
subtitle: Brand, Product Design, front-end

intro.paragraph: art ent is an app that artists can use to find people to give lessons to, and to manage those lessons.
Students can find lessons, created by artists; view lessons and artist profiles, and contact them to book a lesson.

challenge: Artists have no tool to connect with people who want to learn their skills, and have to resort to local announcement boards, public announcement boards, and word of mouth.

goals.goal: - Create a tool for artists to find students.
- Allow for artists to create a basic profile.
- Keep it usable without an account for students.
